pkmkdoc.description:
Welcome to the Appcelerator Titanium SDK.
This installer will install the necessary components to for building Titanium applications on your computer. Once the installation is complete, any remaining files that are required will be automatically downloaded and installed for you.
For more information, please visit http://titaniumapp.com.

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf350 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;\f1\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaSans-TypewriterBold;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\b\fs28 \cf0 Appcelerator Titanium(TM) is an open source tool for building cross-platform native applications using web technologies. \b0\fs26 \ \ For more information, please visit the Titanium Developer Community at:\ \
\f1\b http://titaniumapp.com \f0\b0 \ \ After running the installer, you can get more information on all the cool commands available in Appcelerator by typing the following in your console:\ \
\b > app help \b0 \ \ For example, to create a titanium project, execute the following in your console:\ \
\f1\b > app create:project . my_project titanium \f0\b0 \ \ \
\fs20 Copyright (c) 2008 by Appcelerator, Inc. All Rights Reserved.\ Appcelerator, Titanium and the associated marks are a trademark of Appcelerator, Inc.\ }
